ovdesc.p: This application holds a cross reference between customer and account numbers, and company codes, and any DE.PRODUCT records relating to them.
This is used by the delivery system to locate any special conditions defined for an account, customer or company, defined on the DE.PRODUCT table.

desc.p: The COMPANY, CUSTOMER NUMBER or ACCOUNT NUMBER for which DE.PRODUCT details exist.
In all cases the appropriate mnemonic can be entered. For all account and customer records the preceeding company code will be defaulted to the current company code if not input specified.

a) For a COMPANY level record the standard 9 alphanumeric company code. b) For a CUSTOMER level record in the format ccccccccc.C-nnnnnn where cccccccccc is the company code of the customer, and nnnnnn is the 1 - 6 digit standard customer number. c) For an ACCOUNT level record in the format ccccccccc.A-nnnnnn where cccccccccc is the company code of the customer of the account, and nnnnnn is the 2 - 14 digit standard account number.
The key to the DE.PRODUCT file relating to the company, customer or account defined by the key to this record.
System field - this is a NOINPUT field.
